flavor: You used advanced healing techniques to help the sick and dying. Were you a bonesaw, hacking off limbs to save soldiersâ€™ lives, or did you pursue a private line of work, attending to those with the courage and coin to enlist your services? How did your community regard your work? To learn your trade, did you steal corpses? Did you have a sponsor to supply you materials? Why did you leave this trade and abandon science for religion?
name: Surgeon
